Park Nam Jung

Korean: 박남정

Hometown:

Seoul

박남정
Birthday:
Apr 19, 1966
Age:
59 years old
Height:
5'5" (164 cm)

Introduction

Park Nam Jung (박남정) is a South Korean singer and former actor under NJP Enertainment. He debuted in February 1988 with his first album "아! 바람이여".He is most well-known for inventing the L-Dance craze in the late 80s. He is the father of STAYC's Sieun.
